messages.message: Could you trim down the PDF you want to use instead?
the PDF splitters i’ve tried also nerf my image quality substantially.
Do you have a PDF splitter you’d recommend? @Ted
Because that’s what we use internally

```
PDF Debugging


To inspect a PDF file:

java -jar ~/Downloads/pdfbox-app-2.0.9.jar PDFDebugger AjaxServlet.pdf

To extract text:

java -jar ~/Downloads/pdfbox-app-2.0.9.jar ExtractText AjaxServlet.pdf AjaxServlet.txt

To extract images:

java -jar ~/Downloads/pdfbox-app-2.0.9.jar ExtractImages AjaxServlet.pdf

PDF to Image (page images)

java -jar ~/Downloads/pdfbox-app-2.0.9.jar PDFToImage AjaxServlet.pdf

Decompress PDF

java -jar ~/Downloads/pdfbox-app-2.0.9.jar WriteDecodedDoc AjaxServlet.pdf out.pdf


docker run -d --name mycontainer8g -p 8080:8080 \
   -m 600M -e JAVA_OPTIONS='-Xmx300m' \
    rafabene/java-container:openjdk-env


docker run --name instabase-$(IMAGE_NAME) \
  -e JAVA_OPTIONS='-Xmx500m' \
  -m 1000M \
  --rm -p $(PORT):$(PORT) -e "TSERVICE_FILE_HOST=localhost:9900" \
  -t -i instabase/$(IMAGE_NAME)

  --rm -p $(PORT):$(PORT) -m 3000M -e "TSERVICE_FILE_HOST=localhost:9900" -e JAVA_OPTIONS='-Xmx1500m' \
  -t -i instabase/$(IMAGE_NAME)

```
